metrics.title: Connection Pool Metrics
metrics.description: Real-time performance and connection metrics for your connection pool
metrics.daily_metrics_description: View compressed daily metrics aggregated over 24-hour periods. This data is optimized for storage and provides insights into daily usage patterns.
metrics.weekly_metrics_description: View compressed weekly metrics aggregated over 7-day periods. This data shows long-term trends and weekly usage patterns.
metrics.no_daily_data_description: No daily compressed metrics are available yet. The system needs time to accumulate daily data, or the nntppool version may not support this feature.
metrics.no_weekly_data_description: No weekly compressed metrics are available yet. The system needs time to accumulate weekly data, or the nntppool version may not support this feature.
